talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Blacksmith Corin$
If you don't have any business with me, please let me get back to work.
(You can obtain the quest from Airship Engineer Hubert.)

$???$
...
(You can obtain the quest from Airship Engineer Hubert.)

$???$
...
(You can obtain the quest from Airship Engineer Hubert.)

$Kevin$
You...couldn't catch the thief? (Kevin's eyes tear up.) Oh, no...it's okay. Umm, you should go talk to Mr. Airship Engineer Hubert. I think he wants to talk to you...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You wouldn't believe me if I told you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Airship Engineer Hubert$
I'm sure we can nab that thief and get Kevin's ring back if we track the smell of that stuff May sold me. What was it, anyway? Fuel? Glue? Fertilizer?

$Airship Engineer Hubert$
Whatever. So, we need a Hound to track the scent. Once we get one, we'll have it sniff this. (He holds up the Filthy Cloth.) Here, you take it.
<html>$Hiding in Plain Sight$</html>

$Airship Engineer Hubert$
We should be able to borrow a Hound from Blacksmith Corin. I mean, it's not like we have time to tame a wild Hound.

$Airship Engineer Hubert$
No matter how hard he tries to wipe off the smell, a stink like this will stay for at least a week. Trust me! Now, go borrow a Hound so we can catch this jerk. Here, you'll need this. (Airship Engineer Hubert hands you the Filthy Cloth.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The sooner I can throw this thing away, the better...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Airship Engineer Hubert$
After we get the Hound, we'll just have it sniff that foul thing and follow the scent. Easy, right?
<html>$Hiding in Plain Sight$</html>

$Airship Engineer Hubert$
We should be able to borrow a Hound from Blacksmith Corin. I mean, it's not like we have time to tame a wild Hound.

$Kevin$
You'll find my dad's ring, right? And you'll punch that thief in his stupid face, right?

$???$
...
(There is an odd presence here...)

$???$
...
(There is an odd presence here...)

$Airship Engineer Hubert$
Go get a Hound from Blacksmith Corin, and have it sniff that cloth. Once it has the scent, it should lead you to our culprit. Get to it!

$Blacksmith Corin$
Oh, hello there! What can I... (Blacksmith Corin starts sniffing the air.) ...whoof! What IS that smell? Haven't you been bathing?

$Blacksmith Corin$
Huh? What for? (You explain the situation.)
Hmm. Poor thing. Right, I'll bring you my best Hound for this.

$Blacksmith Corin$
Here. Bring that smelly cloth or whatever over here. This Hound is particularly bright, so it should remember the smell. (Blacksmith Corin takes the cloth and puts it against the Hound's nose.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I did not expect that...maybe I should have...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Blacksmith Corin$
(The Hound starts getting very agitated. Suddenly, it shrieks, hops straight up into the air, and flops to the ground, motionless.)
W-what? What is this? What happened? My Poochoccio! No!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I should probably tell you, May made that horrible stuff...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Blacksmith Corin$
T-this is Hound abuse! I'll have you arrested for poochicide! I'll sue you for assault and poochery!
(Blacksmith Corin is splashing cold water on his Hound as he berates you.)

$Blacksmith Corin$
(The Hound suddenly wakes up and hops to its feet.)
Oh! He's okay. Never mind.
(The Hound grabs the cloth and shreds it into oblivion.)
He looks fine now. Okay, you can take him. Have fun!

$Blacksmith Corin$
You said the thief is somewhere in the Sleepers' Temple, right? If you take Hound there, he'll sniff out your prey easily! Go on, now.

$Blacksmith Corin$
You said the thief is somewhere in the Sleepers' Temple, right? If you take Hound there, he'll sniff out your prey easily! Go on, now.

$Airship Engineer Hubert$
Oh, is that the Hound? Looks decent. Take it to the Sleepers' Temple. I sure hope you find that blasted thief this time.

$Kevin$
Oh! Poochie! Is he gonna help you find my dad's ring? Wow, that's great! Good luck!

$???$
...
(You sense someone here, trying to act like they're not here.)

$Invisible Thief$
(Hound starts pawing at what appears to be thin air.)
Hey. Hey! Dumb mutt, get lost! Beat it! Shoo!

$Invisible Thief$
Hmph. You just got lucky. If I hadn't stepped in that nasty paint, you never would have found me. I'm starting to think that crap is never going to wash off!

$Invisible Thief$
Yeah? What of it? It's just some old rusted ring. I took it for fun.

$Invisible Thief$
Sure, whatever. It's just a ring. You can have it back. Since you found me anyway, I might as well head back to town.

$Invisible Thief$
Relax. I don't feel like running anymore. Let's meet back in Calderock. Come to the upper side of the elite soldiers' tents. I'll be there.
(You hear the thief's footsteps fade into the distance.)

$Nobody$
(Nobody is here now. Go to the elite soldiers' tents at Calderock Village.)

$Invisible Thief$
Hm, you found me pretty quick. Haha.
But...why'd you bring the Hound? You...you don't need that.

$Invisible Thief$
Look, just...just take it home or something. Get rid of it, alright?
(Maybe Hound bit the thief back at the Temple. Better return him to Blacksmith Corin.)

$Blacksmith Corin$
Oh, my Hound has returned! Say, I was thinking...who would I file a Hound abuse case with around here?

$Blacksmith Corin$
Alright. Well, it's chow time for my precious Poochoccio, which means it's time for you to be off. Goodbye!
(Blacksmith Corin quickly collars the Hound, and puts a huge dish of food in front of its face.)

$Blacksmith Corin$
Hmmm... my Hound doesn't seem as energetic as he usually is. Perhaps I really should file for damages...
(Blacksmith Corin gazes at the Hound with fatherly adoration.)

$Airship Engineer Hubert$
Did you make any progress on catching the thief?Kevin could really use some good news, I'd say.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That's a bit arrogant of you, isn't it?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Invisible Thief$
You're here. So am I. I keep my promises, as you can see. Don't look so suspicious! Heh heh heh.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I don't care. Just give me the ring.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Invisible Thief$
Um, hello? I'm invisible! As far as thieves go, I'm pretty far ahead of the pack. If not for your nasty-smelling crap, you NEVER would have found me. But, since you are at least a little more clever than most, I'll share my story with you.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Blacksmith Corin$
You said the thief is somewhere in the Sleepers' Temple, right? If you take Hound there, he'll sniff out your prey easily! Go on, now.

$???$
...
(There is an odd presence here...)

$???$
...
(There is an odd presence here...)

$Kevin$
Oh! Hound! Is he gonna help you find my dad's ring? Wow, that's great! Good luck!

$Airship Engineer Hubert$
Oh, is that the Hound? Looks decent. Take it to the Sleepers's Temple. I sure hope you find that blasted thief this time.

journal.title: Hubert's Hound Plan
journal.contents:
Airship Engineer Hubert seems to be thinking about borrowing a Hound to track down the thief. Hear what he has to say.

Calderock Village → Hubert

journal.title: Sniffing Around
journal.contents:
Borrow a Hound from Blacksmith Corin, and track down the thief.

Calderock Village → Blacksmith Corin
journal.todo_msg: Borrow a Hound from Blacksmith Corin.

journal.title: On the Trail
journal.contents:
Follow the Hound in the Sleepers's Temple, and find the thief.

Gray Ruins → Lower Ridge (Forgotten Temple) → Sleepers's Temple
journal.destination: Follow the Hound in the Sleepers's Temple
journal.todo_msg: Follow the Hound in the Sleepers's Temple

journal.title: The Hound Comes Home
journal.contents:
You found a thief that you cannot see, and agreed to meet him back at Calderock Village. First, return the Hound to Blacksmith Corin.

Calderock Village → Blacksmith Corin
journal.todo_msg: Return the Hound to Blacksmith Corin.

journal.title: The Invisible Thief
journal.contents:
You returned the Hound to Blacksmith Corin. Now, meet the thief near the elite soldiers' tents.

Calderock Village → Invisible Thief
